\"Het spijt mij voor wat ik heb gezegd.\"", "suggested_tags": ["dutch", "B2", "adverbs", "apology"], "image_query": "apologizing face", "audio_text": "apologetic response"}, {"front": "Wat betekent \"hoewel\" in het Nederlands?", "back": "Although; although", "notes": "conjunction; example sentence: \"Hoewel de sneeuw veel gevlochten is.\".", "suggested_tags": ["dutch", "B2", "conjunctions", "wordmeaning"], "image_query": "Hoewel face"}, {"front": "Hoe zit dat met dit kind op school?", "back": "It's a tricky situation.", "notes": "expression; example sentence: \"Het spijt me voor wat ik heb gezegd.\" \"Ik hoef niet mee te gaan en ik kom toch wel thuis, hoeft het ook niet.\"", "suggested_tags": ["dutch", "B2", "situations", "expression"], "image_query": "school problem"}, {"front": "Waarom zeg je dat kind na te kijken?", "back": "To look at something.", "notes": "adverbial phrase; example sentence: \"Ik schrijf naar mijn werk.\"", "suggested_tags": ["dutch", "B2", "adverbs", "lookat"]}, {"front": "Wat betekent \"blik\" in het Nederlands?", "back": "Eye", "notes": "noun", "suggested_tags": ["dutch", "B2", "nouns", "wordmeaning"], "image_query": "eye"}, {"front": "Wat was Gervases gezicht?", "back": "A haughty, disapproving expression."}, {"front": "Hoe zag Gervase eruit?", "back": "His stern and unyielding gaze."}, {"front": "Wat deed Gervase verbaasd aan die vrouw in de kamer?", "back": "He looked at the woman in the room with surprise."}, {"front": "Waarom was Gervase met een kwaad uitgeritte blik naar deze vrouw in de kamer?", "back": "Because of his disapproval towards her appearance."}, {"front": "Wat is de Nederlandse term voor 'verhuizen' in het Engels?", "back": "to move (house), to relocate"}]
